articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction as England beat Greece in the Nations League.
articles.title: Youthful England beat Greece to close in on Nations League top tier return - reaction

articles.description: England interim manager Lee Carsley's finest in charge send positive message to incoming coach Thomas Tuchel
articles.title: Greece v England: Carsley's finest night gives positive signs for Thomas Tuchel

articles.description: Liam Livingstone is dropped three times before taking England to a series-clinching three-wicket win over West Indies in the third T20.
articles.title: England in West Indies: Tourists seal T20 series win with nervy victory

articles.description: In a wide-ranging interview with BBC Sport, Billie Jean King talks tennis format changes, Saudi Arabia and Britain's Emma Raducanu.
articles.title: Billie Jean King: Tennis great on format changes, Saudi Arabia and Emma Raducanu

articles.description: England have invested time and expertise in their new high-tempo defence. As the defeats stack up, have they got enough faith to see it through against the world champions?
articles.title: England v South Africa: Can hosts keep faith in the blitz?

articles.description: Alisson Becker's imminent return from injury means Caoimhin Kelleher's latest run in the Liverpool team might be over - so what next for a goalkeeper who 'could be one of the world's best'?
articles.title: Caoimhin Kelleher: What now for Liverpool goalkeeper as Alisson Becker nears return?

articles.description: Mike Tyson slapped Jake Paul during their final face-off after both men made weight for their heavyweight fight on Friday.
articles.title: Mike Tyson vs Jake Paul: Tyson slaps Paul during final face-off at weigh-in

articles.description: Trent Alexander-Arnold continues to reject contract offers from Liverpool, West Ham stand firm on Mohammed Kudus’ £85m release clause, Xabi Alonso set to leave Bayer Leverkusen next summer.
articles.title: Football gossip: Alexander-Arnold, Kudus, Alonso, Murillo, Robinson, Kvaratskhelia, Chiesa

articles.description: Ireland have come under criticism since their loss to New Zealand in Dublin a week ago. Was the defeat a blip or part of a trend?
articles.title: Ireland vs Argentina: Andy Farrell's side out to prove All Blacks loss just a blip

articles.description: Local police in Athens are said to have used riot shields and tear gas to control England fans before the Nations League fixture with Greece.
articles.title: Nations League: Greek police criticised for 'heavy-handed' treatment of England fans
